name: Alcheminer
description:
This is a Ludum Dare #48 game, made in one long weekend - check its jam page here!

Story

Your nephew Kevin screwed up, and you got your opportunity to help in the Alchemical mine underneath your sprite-family's Potion Factory!

Fulfill the requests from your Uncle, curse at fluid dynamics, and use pumps and switches to get all the juice out of the ground.

Tips
  • Mouse drag / AWSD to pan, scrollwheel to zoom
  • Drag pipes
  • Hold right-mouse to unsummon things
  • Make sure to follow the story at the bottom, it unlocks things
  • Branching can lead to bubbles in your pipes! Chop em off!
  • Pumps accelerate your bizz
  • Unlock deeper areas by clicking on the dark areas
Known issues
  • Caves can sometimes clip your start cave
